info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 6:14PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Luna County through 645 PM MDT... At 613 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles north of Columbus, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Luna County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
